name: Prospective data
description: The organisation is responsible for data covered by this prospective specificaton

name: Expected data
description: The organisation should provide data as a member of the project developing the specification

name: Encouraged data
description: The organisation is encouraged to provide data to this standard

name: Statutory data
description: The organisation has a statutory duty to provide data to this standard

name: Authoritative source
description: The organisation is the authoritative source of this data
